rComments: I had her in the fall for one of my 1st classes in Kresge and she is definitely one that grows on you. You have to get used to her, she doesn't baby or praise often, she tells you what's wrong with your paper knowing you have a lot more potential to offer. She is a great teacher if you are willing to put forth effort in yourself and your work. :)

She's a great, energectic teacher and she's very helpful. She gives a lot of input on rough drafts. In her class you must speak, you must participate in the class discussions. My writing has definitely improved in her class.
